resources.string: Our Mission For Willoughby House Of Prayer

Our mission is to help people discover how much God loves them.
 We are called to share with others how God wants everyone to know Him and have a personal relationship with His Son Jesus Christ
 Our vision is that The House Of Prayer located in downtown Willoughby is where people can come for non-judgemental and compassionate prayer support as they deal with the troubles and concern in their lives.
 The Willoughby House Of Prayer is A Christ-centered Healing Ministry. We are here to pray for you or with you if so desired
Willoughby House Of Prayer\n 4091 Erie St. Willoughby Oh 44094/Activities and Events
Activities For further information call Darlene 440-942-5966

Thursdays:
11:00-12:00PM Bible Study
THURSDAY EVENINGS:
5PM-8PM ADDICTION SUPPORT FOR SUFFERING AND FAMILIES
Support by listening and praying for healing for the addicted.

Also FROM 5PM-8PM
PRAY FOR THOSE IN PRISON
Support by listening and praying for loved ones in prison.
Info:Charlie 440-990-8517

 As you keep the Willoughby Area House of Prayer in your prayers,Please consider joining this ministry.
Thank You And God Bless You!!
Willoughby House Of Prayer\n4091 Erie St. 44094
Dry erase board for prayer requests on outside window Available 24/7\nWe will transfer the prayers inside on a prayer wall\n And pray for them for four weeks
